original_text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.
korean_text: 또 그 귀를 진리에서 돌이켜 허탄한 이야기를 따르리라

sentences.original_text: And they shall turn away their ears from truth
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 진리에서 그들의 귀를 돌릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and shall be turned unto fables
